body_html: @VinceMarron in your STFT example, the Mel matrix is the only part that relies on Exp I believe. You can move the linear_to_mel_weight_matrix call outside of the GPU device assignment block, or use soft device placement (which should automatically put the Exp on CPU): https://www.tensorflow.org/tutorials/using_gpu#using_a_single_gpu_on_a_multi-gpu_system
